description.value:
Type: Exarch

Alignment: Evil

Gender: Male

Sphere: Goblins

Dominion: Banehold

Priests: Shamans

Adjective: Maglubiyan

Maglubiyet is the patron and ruler of both goblins and hobgoblins, and governs war and rulership among both races.

Published in Forgotten Realms Campaign Guide, page(s) 81.
